response.overview: This story is about a troupe member. One of the promising young actors is Ryo. Ryo belongs to the troupe An"Apollon", which is about to perform an important performance in a month. However, on the first day of the practice, Ryo goes missing and they have a bad feeling about this. An"Apollon" of chairperson Shun Sawamura was desperately searching for Ryo in order to make the performance a success. But the suddenly, a member of the troupe Minoru, tells Sawamura that he will quit at the next performance. Will the troubled troupe members perform successfully.. Passing and intersecting thoughts they are passing and intersecting thoughts. Cruel Story of Youth.
response.title: Hyacinth
